text: Nanren shi nuren de baohu zhe [zhu][he gongyang zhe], yin wei an la shi tamen bi tamen geng youyue, hai yinwei tamen huafei tamen de caiwu [gongyang tamen], suoyi, xianshu de funu ying shi shuncong [an la he zhangfu] de, shi [zai zhangfu buzai shi] jie an la suo mingling [tamen] baohu de baochi ziji zhencao de. Zhiyu nimen kanjian bu zhong de nuren,[shouxian] nimen dang quangao tamen,[ranhou] nimen buyao yu tamen tong chuang,[zuihou] nimen keyi da [chengfa] tamen. Jiaru tamen shuncong nimen, name, nimen jiu buyao zai xiang banfa qu qifu tamen. An la que shi zui qinggao de, zui weida de.
